meanings.definition: To fill or pack again with material.
meanings.sent1: I need to restuffing my pillow because it feels flat.
meanings.sent2: She is restuffing the teddy bear to make it fluffy again.
meanings.sent3: After the pillow fight, they had to restuffing the pillows for the next round.
meanings.sent4: The chef decided to restuffing the turkey with more herbs for extra flavor.
meanings.sent5: The mechanic had to restuffing the cushion in the car seat to make it comfortable for long drives.

meanings.definition: The act of adding more stuffing to something.
meanings.sent1: The restuffing of the couch made it much more comfortable.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed the restuffing of her favorite toy, making it look new again.
meanings.sent3: The restuffing of the chair turned into a fun DIY project for the family.
meanings.sent4: The restuffing of the mattress transformed it into a cozy place to sleep.
meanings.sent5: The restuffing of the sofa revealed hidden treasures lost in the cushions.
